row.ingredients: tomate; cebolla; berenjena; ajo; vino blanco; huevo; perejil; queso; polvo de galletas; sal
row.ingredients_en: tomato; onion; eggplant; garlic; white wine; egg; parsley; cheese; cracker meal; salt
row.ingredients_list: 6 tomates; 1 cebolla; 3 berenjenas; 1 ajo; 1 taza de vino blanco; 3 yemas de huevo; perejil; 1 taza queso rallado; polvo de galletas; sal
row.ingredient_list_en: 6 tomatoes; 1 onion; 3 eggplants; 1 garlic; 1 cup white wine; 3 egg yolks; parsley; 1 cup grated cheese; cookie powder; salt
row.directions: Se dividen los tomates en dos y se vacian, se sazonan con sal y pimienta.;Se fríen con la cebolla cortada en pedacitos pequeños la berenjena en rodajas finas.;Se rocían con vino blanco.;Se añade la sal a gusto, perejil y el queso rallado.;Se deja enfriar y se agregan las tres yemas de huevo.;Se rellenan los tomates y se espolvorean con el polvo de galletas.;Se colocan en un molde, se rocían con queso parmesano rallado y se gratinan al horno durante 5 minutos.;Se sirven en su mismo jugo.
row.directions_en: Tomatoes are divided into two and are emptied, seasoned with salt and pepper.; They are fried with the onion cut into small pieces the eggplant in thin slices.; They are sprinkled with white wine.; Add the salt to taste, parsley and grated cheese.; Let it cool and add the three egg yolks; Tomatoes are stuffed and sprinkled with cookie powder; They are placed in a mold, sprinkled with grated Parmesan cheese and au gratin in the oven for 5 minutes.; They are served in the same juice.
row.title: tomates a la mireille
